text: Amapola () is Spanish for "poppy", meaning the genus Papaver Amapola may also refer to: * "Amapola" (song), a 1920 song written by Joseph Lacalle * Amapola (film), a 2014 Argentine-American romantic comedy fantasy film * Amapola Flyg, a cargo airline based in Stockholm, Sweden * stage name of Maria Amapola Cabase (born 1948), Filipino singer and actress * La Amapola (born 1976), ring name of Guadalupe Ramona Olvera, Mexican professional wrestler Category:Spanish words and phrases
title: Amapola
